titleStmt.title: The confession of George Casvvell Gent executed at Tyburn, on Monday the 21st of December 1691 for the murther of Andrew Hickson. With a true copy of a paper delivered by him at the place of execution.
titleStmt.author: Caswell, George, d. 1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Langley Curtiss at Sir Edmondbury Godfrey's Heed [sic] near Fleet-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
